Method Detail

setGlobalSkin

@ClientOnly
void setGlobalSkin(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity target,
                              String Url)
Deprecated. see SpoutPlayer.setSkin(String) instead.

Sets the skin for the target human that is visible to all players

Parameters:
target - to change the skin for
Url - for the new skin

setPlayerSkin

                              org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity target,
                              String Url)
Deprecated. see SpoutPlayer.setSkinFor(SpoutPlayer, String) instead.

Sets the skin for the target human that is only visible to the viewingPlayer

Parameters:
viewingPlayer - that will see the new skin
target - to change the skin for
Url - for the new skin

setPlayerTitle

@ClientOnly
void setPlayerTitle(SpoutPlayer viewingPlayer,
                               org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity target,
                               String title)
Deprecated. see SpoutPlayer.setTitleFor(SpoutPlayer, String) instead.

Sets the title for the target living entity that is only visible to the viewingPlayer Note: if the title has newline characters ('\n') in it, it will be rendered over multiple lines

Parameters:
viewingPlayer - that will see the new title
target - to change the title for
title - to set to the target

Parameters:

title - to set to the target

setEntitySkin

@ClientOnly
void setEntitySkin(SpoutPlayer viewingPlayer,
                              org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity target,
                              String url,
                              EntitySkinType type)
Deprecated. see SpoutPlayer.setEntitySkin(LivingEntity, String, EntitySkinType) instead.

Sets a new skin for the given target.

Parameters:
viewingPlayer - that sees the target
target - to change the skin for
url - of the texture

setGlobalEntitySkin

@ClientOnly
@Deprecated
void setGlobalEntitySkin(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity,
                                               String url,
                                               EntitySkinType type)
Deprecated. 

Sets a new secondary skin for the given target. This skin will be used for mobs that have 2 "states" (spiders, ghasts, sheep).

Parameters:
viewingPlayer - that sees the target
target - to change the skin for
url - of the texture

resetEntitySkin

@ClientOnly
void resetEntitySkin(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity)
Deprecated. see SpoutPlayer.resetEntitySkin(LivingEntity) instead.

Resets the skin for the given entity back to the users default texture pack skin

Parameters:
entity - to reset the skin for
